sentences: Ta on märganud mu uue juuksestiili.
Oleme märganud, et ta on viimaste päevadega väga väsinud.
context: Märganud is the past participle form of the Estonian verb 'märgama', which means to notice or observe. It indicates that someone has seen or noticed something in the past. The word can be used as an adjective or as part of compound tenses, often appearing before a clause starting with 'et' (that) to introduce what was noticed.
